name: Jetpack Roller Ball
description:
A bite size game from Spicy K Studios. How long can you survive this endless stream of barrels? Use your jetpack power-up wisely to push yourself further!

Keyboard controls: "A" and "D" to move left and right. Spacebar activates your jetpack.

On-screen controls: Left and right buttons move you left and right. Hit the "fire" icon to activate your jetpack!

Please note that, as Unity does not officially support WebGL builds on mobile devices, Jetpack Roller Ball may or may not function properly on some phones.
